Translations.Text: Pominayte Allakha v ustanovlennyye dni. A yesli kto toropitsya [i zavershayet obryad] v dva dnya, to net grekha na nem. A yesli kto zaderzhitsya i [zavershit obryad po istechenii trekh dney], to net grekha na nem. I vse eto dlya bogoboyaznennykh. Boytes' zhe Allakha i znayte, chto k Nemu prizovut vas [i predstanete] vy pred Nim
Sredi lyudey yest' takoy, rechi kotorogo ob etom mire vyzyvayut voskhishcheniye. On prizyvayet Allakha v svideteli tomu, chto u nego na serdtse, i on - zayadlyy sporshchik
Kogda zhe on otvrashchayetsya [ot tebya], to pospeshayet tvorit' nechestiye na zemle, gubit' posevy i lyudskoy rod. No Allakh ne lyubit nechestiya
Kogda zhe yemu govoryat: "Boysya Allakha!" - im ovladevayet grekhovnoye velichiye. Dovol'no dlya nego ada - a ved' eto skvernoye pribezhishche
Sredi lyudey yest' i takoy, kotoryy prinosit v zhertvu dushu, zhelaya zasluzhit' blagovoleniye Allakha. A Allakh - blagovolyashchiy k rabam
O vy, kotoryye uverovali! Bud'te pokorny Allakhu vsetselo i ne sleduyte po stopam shaytana, ibo on, voistinu, - yavnyy vrag vam
A yesli vy, posle togo kak yavilis' vam yasnyye znameniya, vpadete v zabluzhdeniye, to znayte, chto Allakh - velik, mudr

Neuzheli zhe oni nadeyutsya na chto-libo inoye, krome kak na to, chto Allakh v soprovozhdenii angelov yavitsya k nim, osenennyy oblakami? Vse uzhe resheno, i dela vozvrashchayutsya k Allakhu [v Sudnyy den']
